2.0.0-beta3.name: drupal/resource

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

2.0.0-beta3.description: Extends stream wrappers and adds a new public file scheme named 'resource'. Also provide a full plugable API for dynamic on-demand files generation based on path ruleset. Enabling this module will create a derivation of actual core CSS and JS aggregation through it, as well as image style generation.
